page.title: 13YOUTH ACTIVITIES, SHERBORNE
page.content: Sherborne youngsters can join the Youth Club, Army Cadets, Air Training Corps, Venture Scouts, Girl Guides and other organizations. { Army Cadet Force: The Sherborne detachment is run by N.Caswell. There are 26 members. When a person joins he gets a free uniform and free training. The Army Cadets Force started in 1859. There are 3 companies in the Dorset area and in each company there are 6 detachments. Each year all the Cadets go on annual camp, where all three companies join up. Many members hope for a career in the army. Of the other activities, the Youth Club has a full_time Leader and is very popular.
